inicio_title: Get closer to the crypto world.
inicio_par: The simplest and safest way to trade cryptocurrencies.
Servicios-sub: What can you do on Coin+?
Servicios-card-1-par: Learn about the main cryptos, how they work and what moves the market.
Servicios-card-2-par: Access the entire Etherum network and other digital assets in a few steps.
Servicios-card-3-par: Transform your cryptos into other currencies and/or dollars quickly and safely.
Quienes-par: The simplest and safest way to trade cryptocurrencies.
notifi-par: Every time you make a transaction you will receive a notification in your email.
Nombre-error-vali: The Name field only accepts letters
Apellido-error-vali: The Surname field only accepts letters
DNI-error-vali: The DNI field only accepts numeric characters with a minimum of 8
Telefono-error: The contact number field is required
Telefono-error-vali: The Contact Number field only accepts numeric characters with a minimum of 10
Pais-error-vali: The Country field only accepts letters
Postal--error-vali: The Postal Code field only accepts numeric characters with a minimum of 4
Metamask-par-1: MetaMask is a browser extension that serves as an Ethereum wallet. Once installed, it allows users to store Ether, allowing them to transact to any Ethereum address. It also allows access to other selected blockchains. and compatible.
Metamask-par-3: 1. Download and install the Google Chrome extension or Firefox addon, depending on your browser.
Metamask-par-4: 2. Create your account if you don't have one and that's it!
Metamask-par-5: Important: MetaMask will complete your 12-word backup phrase for you. This will be necessary to recover your wallet if you ever forget your password or lose access to your computer, and you should store it somewhere safe .
Elige-cuenta: Complete the details of your operation
Desde-donde: From where do you send us your money?
En-que-Cuenta: In which account do you want to receive your money?
